::Hot Rod::

He looked at the battle field. This wasn't good. It was truely their
darkest hour. He walked around, untill he saw Motor Master.
"Well, long time no see, Decepticreep. Remember me?"
He opens fire with plasma charges on Motor Master.

::Epyon::

He also headed out to the battle field, looking for a target.

::DrillBit::

He had lost track of the others in his thoughts. He walked to the
command center, and saw reports on the CF battle.
He opened a comm to DarkFate and Killfest.
"Where are you guys? We need to talk."

OOC: I'm not sure if the traders field opened, so i'm just going to post
that it did.

::Dollen::

He left the traders base, retreaved his weapons, and flew off. Heading
back to base.

::Demolition::

"Should we continue, Havoc?"

OOC: If the War Machines are still together, then he said that normaly,
if they arn't it was into a comm.
